Detailed Description

Class used to store a (xml) pack of levels.

Scores (Paths) associed with these levels are loaded from an external (xml too) file and are relative to loggued player (param to constructor)

Constructor for a pack from xml files. One for levels, one for paths (solutions/high scores)

Parameters:

xmlPackFile name of the xml file containing a pack of levels situated in data/levels/

const char *  xmlPackFile 
) [protected]

Create a tree based on a pack xml file and gets nodes related with levels

Returns:
tree Tree opened (we return for suppression after work on nodes)
